## Description {#details}

The result of a query.

It either indicates a final answer of Legal or Unsupported or describes an action that must be taken to make an operation more legal.

Definition at line 143 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/include/llvm/codegen/globalisel/legalizerinfo-h">LegalizerInfo.h</a>.
